txt.en: Beornings are known for throwing their considerable weight around in battle.
The enemy is prepared for swords, spears, maces, hammers, and even great halberds, but none are ready to counter the full might of a Beorning.
Champions are known for their reckless and powerful strikes in battle, cleaving any foolish enough to stand in their way.
There is no holding back once the battle has been joined, no time to be clouded by restraint or hesitation. The time for caution is before, and the time for regret is after.
